mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM (WACTR_CD, CLNT_CD, LOC_CD, ITEM_CD, ITEM_NM, BOX_UNIT, PLT_IN_BOX, REMK, REG_DT, REG_NM) VALUES (#{wactrCd}, #{clntCd}, #{locCd}, #{itemCd}, #{itemNm}, #{boxUnit}, #{pltInBox}, #{remk}, SYSDATE, #{regNm})
mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM idx, A.* FROM ( SELECT A.WACTR_CD , B.WACTR_NM , A.CLNT_CD , C.CLNT_NM , A.LOC_CD , A.ITEM_CD , A.ITEM_NM , A.BOX_UNIT , A.PLT_IN_BOX , A.REMK FROM ITEM A INNER JOIN WACTR B ON A.WACTR_CD = B.WACTR_CD INNER JOIN CLNT C ON A.CLNT_CD = C.CLNT_CD INNER JOIN LOC D ON A.LOC_CD = D.LOC_CD WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC ) A
WHERE A.CLNT_NM like '%'||#{clntNm}||'%'
WHERE A.ITEM_CD like '%'||#{itemCd}||'%'
WHERE A.ITEM_NM like '%'||#{itemNm}||'%'
WHERE A.CLNT_NM like '%'||#{clntNm}||'%' AND A.ITEM_CD like '%'||#{itemCd}||'%'
WHERE A.ITEM_CD like '%'||#{itemCd}||'%' AND UPPER(A.ITEM_NM) like UPPER('%'||#{itemNm}||'%')
WHERE A.CLNT_NM like '%'||#{clntNm}||'%' AND UPPER(A.ITEM_NM) like UPPER('%'||#{itemNm}||'%')
WHERE A.CLNT_NM like '%'||#{clntNm}||'%' AND A.ITEM_CD like '%'||#{itemCd}||'%' AND UPPER(A.ITEM_NM) like UPPER('%'||#{itemNm}||'%')

SELECT ROWNUM idx, A.* FROM ( SELECT A.WACTR_CD , B.WACTR_NM , A.CLNT_CD , C.CLNT_NM , A.LOC_CD , A.ITEM_CD , A.ITEM_NM , A.BOX_UNIT , A.PLT_IN_BOX , A.REMK FROM ITEM A INNER JOIN WACTR B ON A.WACTR_CD = B.WACTR_CD INNER JOIN CLNT C ON A.CLNT_CD = C.CLNT_CD INNER JOIN LOC D ON A.LOC_CD = D.LOC_CD WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC ) A WHERE WACTR_CD || CLNT_CD || LOC_CD || ITEM_CD = #{keyVal}
